seo.title: Food Delivery Menu
seo.description: Fast and easy food delivery service to spoil the foodie within you. Find international cuisines and top restaurant promos.

add_credit_card.loading_tips: It'll only take a few seconds...
add_credit_card.tc: Your card may be charged to make sure it’s valid. That amount will be automatically refunded. By adding a card, you have read and agree to our terms and conditions.

basket.loginPrompt: You'll have to login or provide your contact to checkout.

new_basket.desc: Adding this item from {{newRestoName}} will clear your basket of items from {{oldRestoName}}. Proceed?
new_basket.title: Start New Basket?

menu_item.popover_heading: Ready to order? Download the Grab app and add this to your basket!
menu_item.popover_login: Please login to add this item to your basket.

order_info.all_item_unavailable: Oh, snap! All items in your basket are unavailable
order_info.all_item_unavailable_info: When you switch to this order option, all items in your basket will become unavailable. Proceed to switch?

cancel.allocatedMessage: Are you sure you want to cancel?
cancel.heading: Cancel Order?
cancel.notAllocatedMessage: We may find you a driver soon. Are you sure you want to cancel?

cancel_reason.heading: Let us know why you cancelled - every feedback counts!

delivery.eta: Delivery time: {{eta}} min ({{distance, intlNumber}} km away)

driver_info.tips: Your driver may reach out to you through phone call or sms via the numbers above.

eater_location.note_placeholder: e.g. Meet me at the lobby

fee_summary.fee_note: Delivery Fee will be shown after you review order

tooltip.body: The subtotal is an estimate as the restaurant might update the item prices. The actual amount will be confirmed by your driver.

update_prices_disclaimer.dax: *The total has been adjusted by your driver.
update_prices_disclaimer.mex: *The total has changed as the order was updated.

payment.cash_only: Only cash payment is available for now.

place_auto_comp.error_invalid_address: Hmm, this address doesn't seem right.

detect_location_error.cross_country_location: Your location is outside of your country. Please type your address manually.

body.add_cashless_payment: Open the Grab app and add a card or wallet to your account.
body.cant_use_offer: Nonetheless, you can still continue with the transaction.
body.consent_receive_updates: I hereby consent for Grab to share my name, email, phone number and...
body.consent_receive_updates_long: I hereby consent for Grab to share my name, email, phone number and order information with The Coca-Cola Company and its subsidiaries/affiliates (‘Coca-Cola’), and that Coca-Cola may use the personal information for the purposes of offering marketing communications, promotional information, benefits from Coca-Cola in accordance with Coca-Cola's Privacy Notice (Coca-Cola Privacy Policy | Coca-Cola SG). You can change your preference anytime on the Grab Setting page.
body.far_from_fridge: Be sure to stand in front of it if you fancy a tasty drink!
body.foreign_fee: This maybe applied if you are using overseas payment option
body.foreign_txn_fee: This is a charge that your bank or credit card issuer may apply when you make a transaction in a foreign currency.
body.fridge_in_use: Please wait a while before trying again.
body.fridge_issue: Please try again. If this problem persists, call <number> for assistance.
body.insufficient_balance: Insufficient balance. Please top up and then re-scan the QR code.
body.no_drink_taken: We’ll release the pre-authorisation of {{price}} to you. This may take some time.
body.no_drink_taken_type_2: The pre-authorisation amount will be released back to you shortly.
body.payment_method_error: To proceed, please change your payment method.
body.preauth_amt: There will be a pre-auth to x dollar when opening fridge, which will be refunded upon payment finalisation. The refund duration will be varied for different payment provider.
body.preauthorisation_01: This is a temporary hold on funds placed by your bank or card issuer, to verify that the card is valid and has sufficient funds for the transaction.
body.preauthorisation_02: This is not a charge, and it will be released back to your account within a few days, depending on your bank's policy.
body.processing_payment: A pre-authorisation of {{price}} will be placed on hold. Any unused amount will be released to you.
body.scanning_qr_issue: Please try again. If this problem persists, contact Grab Support.
body.settle_first: Looks like you have an outstanding payment. Settle first, then drink later!
body.step_01: Unlock the fridge and grab your drinks.
body.success: Payment will be deducted in a moment.
body.times_up: Once that’s done, we’ll process the payment.

heading.add_cashless_payment: Add a cashless payment method to continue

heading.settle_first: There’s one last thing separating you from your drinks
heading.times_up: Time’s up, please close the fridge

empty_basket.description: Add items to your basket and place order here.

login.header: Log In or Sign Up to Place Your Order
login.header_sg: Log In to Place Your Order
login.note: New to Grab? Sign up now to get started! Or log in to your existing account.
login.note_sg: New to Grab? Download the app to get started! Or log in to your existing account.

page_checkout.price_change_alert: Prices of some items may change for this order option.
page_checkout.prompt_text: Use other payment methods and enjoy exclusive promo only on Grab app.

banner.title: Your favourite food at your fingertips

1.text: Find something you like with our specially curated restaurant list.
1.title: Discover Great Restaurants

2.text: Be it one item or more, we'll be sure to deliver them all!
2.title: No Minimum Order

3.text: Just stay home and enjoy your favourite food!
3.title: Delivery to Your Doorstep

footer.text: Download the Grab app and start ordering now! You know you want it.

page_home.heading: Discover restaurants here, order through the Grab app!

accept_cash.content: Sure, we do! GrabFood accepts all forms of payments for food delivery services, including cash on delivery.
accept_cash.title: Does GrabFood accept Cash?

delivery_timing.content: We understand only one language - food, so yes, we do. Please note, though we are here as your 24x7 food partners, few of our listed restaurants may have late-night food delivery restrictions or may be unavailable for orders.
delivery_timing.title: Does GrabFood provide food delivery 24x7?

how_much.content: Our delivery fee depends on a lot of operational factors like distance from your location to the restaurant. You can check the exact amount you are paying as delivery charges before checking out on the Grab app. You can also subscribe to GrabUnlimited to get a Free Delivery for your orders.
how_much.title: How much does GrabFood charge for delivery?

how_to_order.content: Here is the easiest way to order food from GrabFood in  Indonesia:

point1.content: Enter your address on the home page. Look at the GrabFood Listed Restaurants and Food spots near you. Pick your favorite restaurant and browse through the menu and select the dish you want to order.
point1.title: Search your favorite restaurant or the dish

point2.content: Once sure that you are ordering enough, click on the "ORDER NOW" tab and enter your final food delivery address. Choose the payment method that best suits you, and checkout.
point2.title: Checkout & Payment

point3.content: GrabFood has designed a seamless customer journey for you, so you can enjoy your food hassle-free. We will send you a notification for your order status.
point3.title: Delivery

how_to_order.title: How to order Grabfood online?

min_order.content: Yes! But you can pay the difference if your order is less than the minimum order amount.
min_order.title: Does GrabFood have a minimum order?

order_for_others.content:
Of course, pamper your loved ones by having their favorite food delivered to their door.
mungkjadi Just update the recipient's name and delivery address before placing your order.
order_for_others.title: Can I order GrabFood for someone else?

pay_online.content: GrabFood accepts multiple forms of payments for online food orders, including online payments using a credit or debit card, PayPal or cash on delivery.
pay_online.title: Can I pay online on GrabFood for my food orders?

what_is_grabfood.content: GrabFood is the fastest Food Delivery service in  Indonesia. We have curated all your favorite dishes, restaurants, and cuisines to help you grab your food in the easiest & quickest way possible. Find and order your favorite cuisines across  Indonesia - order food online in just a few taps, from Thick Toast - Menteng for Breakfast, Mie Aceh Pandrah - Sawah Besar for Lunch, Ochim's Diner - Cikini for Dinner! We are here to satisfy your hunger with a wide selection of merchant partners in Indonesia.
what_is_grabfood.title: What is GrabFood?

which_restaurants.content1: What don’t we have on GrabFood? We boast the widest variety of restaurants and cuisines of any food delivery app in Indonesia. You can choose from thousands of restaurants on GrabFood Indonesia. You can order food online from all your favorite food spots from KFC, McDonald’s, Hokben, Richeese Factory, Pizza hut, Geprek Bensu, Burger King, Domino’s Pizza, Ayam Gepuk Pak Gembus, Rocket Chicken, Bebek Kaleyo, and many many more!
which_restaurants.content2: GrabFood also runs exclusive limited time promotions, deals and discounts for our listed restaurants. You can enjoy huge savings and tons of other offers on your food orders. Time to order now!
which_restaurants.title: Which restaurants are listed in GrabFood?

accept_cash.content: Sure, we do! GrabFood accepts all forms of payments for food delivery services, including cash on delivery in  Malaysia.
accept_cash.title: Does GrabFood accept Cash?

delivery_timing.content: We understand only one language - food, so yes, we do.. Please note, though we are here as your 24x7 food partners, few of our listed restaurants may have late-night food delivery restrictions or may be unavailable for orders. But we have listed the ones that love your late-night binging in our Late Night Delivery Section.
delivery_timing.title: Does GrabFood provide food delivery 24x7?

how_much.content: Our delivery fee depends on a lot of operational factors like distance from your location to the restaurant. You can check the exact amount you are paying as delivery charges before checking out on the Grab app. There is also a  “Free Delivery” section that lists restaurants near you that don’t charge for delivery.
how_much.title: How much does GrabFood charge for delivery?

how_to_order.content: Here is the easiest way to order food from GrabFood in Malaysia:

point1.content: Enter your address on the home page. Look at the GrabFood Listed Restaurants and Food spots near you. Pick your favorite restaurant and browse through the menu and select the dish you want to order.
point1.title: Search your favorite restaurant or the dish

point2.content: Once sure that you are ordering enough, click on the "ORDER NOW" tab and enter your final food delivery address. Choose the payment method that best suits you, and checkout.
point2.title: Checkout & Payment

point3.content: GrabFood has designed a seamless customer journey for you, so you can enjoy your food hassle-free. We will send you an instant email and SMS confirming your order and expected delivery time. Your food is then on its way.
point3.title: Delivery

how_to_order.title: How to order Grabfood online?

min_order.content: Yes! But you can pay the difference if your order is less than the minimum order amount.
min_order.title: Does GrabFood have a minimum order?

order_for_others.content: Of course, pamper your loved ones by having their favourite food delivered to their door. Just update the recipient's name and delivery address before placing your order.
order_for_others.title: Can I order GrabFood for someone else?
